backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing file, note, folder, mission, and authorization logic with metadata types, storage mixins, access control, pagination, and various diagnostic/health query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping performance‑related features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing Draft Baseline v114 with verification steps, parity checks, and strict change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA config, icons, meta tags, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑control freeze notice prohibiting code modifications until explicit user approval after baseline restoration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and icon set for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, cache cleanup, and optimized fetch handling.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Guide outlining Chrome PWA installability requirements and verification steps including manifest, icons, HTTPS, and service worker checks.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Detailed checklist confirming all frontend files and behaviors match Live version 114.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring providers and showing HomePage with optional intro animation on login.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Displays initialization error states with retry, logout, and collapsible technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Shows a fixed decorative bottom border line for UI styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when the browser blocks new windows.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files, performing actions like open, download, move, or delete, with type‑specific preview rendering.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads with progress tracking, validation, and speech‑to‑text note input.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens folder UI, displaying a folder icon and optional disabled/overlay states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog supporting create, rename, delete, and selection actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full-screen folder manager allowing create, rename, delete, and select operations with backend mutations and swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen file viewer with swipe navigation, delete, share, download, move, and external-open support.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders file/note gallery with selection, previews, long-press handling, and dialogs for viewing, moving, and sharing content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, authentication dropdown, app title, and a unified progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Intro splash screen showing an animated icon that fades out and signals completion after a short delay.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link fails to open, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button that triggers Internet Identity sign-in and shows a loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission detail view handling title editing, tasks, files, notes, and autosave with viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task management before submitting to backend.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the Missions view.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen list of missions with creation, deletion, filtering, swipe actions, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Layout wrapper restricting content to mobile-only styling.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a chosen mission.
frontend/src/components/NotesButton.tsx: Empty file placeholder for notes button component.
frontend/src/components/NotesDialog.tsx: Empty file placeholder for notes dialog component.
frontend/src/components/NotesFullScreenV: Empty file placeholder for full-screen notes view.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with actions for downloading, sharing, deleting, or sending it elsewhere.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Empty file placeholder for profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Modal for moving selected files or notes into a folder or back to the main collection, using folder queries and mutation hooks.
Swipeable row component that reveals edit and delete actions based on drag gestures.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a unified upload progress bar showing overall percentage and item count during active uploads.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Landing screen with introductory text, target-themed graphic, and login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retry logic, error handling, and admin token setup.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking multiple upload progress states with coalesced updates and computed total progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Hook that prefetches core home data (folders, missions, files, notes) once when the actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer like touch, updating on pointer-type changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced autosaving of mission title and tasks with change detection, mission switching resets, and queued saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and modifying missions, with actor readiness and identity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes across folders and missions with targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for file and folder operations including listing, uploading, and creating folders, with concurrency limits and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: React hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition with interim/final transcript handling and error reporting.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive light/dark mode CSS variables for color themes and layout tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility merging conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home screen managing folder/mission views, data prefetching, authentication state, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Utilities and constants for classifying actor initialization errors and extracting error details.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Helpers for opening URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing content via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Logic deciding how files should open based on MIME category, including viewer, preview, or download behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type, determines previewability, and returns human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, checks completion status, and splits missions into completed/incomplete lists.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Performs BigInt-safe deep equality checks on task arrays.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides lazy-initialized performance logging and timing utilities, including async operation timing.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Offers React Query cache inspection and mutation lifecycle logging for mission-related diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs an end-to-end smoke test covering folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list verification.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise concurrency limiter with queued execution.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, animations, and plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all files defining the v114 frontend baseline for drift detection.
project_state.json: Describes project performance goals, constraints, existing features, and state metadata.
